hero.name: Marine Allavoine
hero.description: Front-End Developer on a mission to make the web more accessible.

about.aboutContent1: Hi, I'm Marine! Graduated in Visual Arts and having a first career as a visual merchandiser, I decided to reinvent myself in web development and completed a Front-End developer training.
about.aboutContent2: My goal is to use the skills I acquired during my journey to serve accessibility for all.
about.aboutContent3: My journey? An eclectic mix of art, commerce, and technology. I discovered my passion for digital accessibility, a quest that motivates me every day.
about.aboutContent4: Welcome to my world, where aesthetics and functionality meet to offer unique and inclusive web experiences.
